description: Retrieves information about the specified resource configuration.

parameters.name: resourceConfigurationIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the resource configuration.

nested_items.name: allowAssociationToShareableServiceNetwork
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the resource configuration is associated with a sharable service network.

nested_items.name: amazonManaged
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the resource configuration was created and is managed by Amazon.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource configuration.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the resource configuration was created, in ISO-8601 format.

nested_items.name: customDomainName
nested_items.description: The custom domain name of the resource configuration.

nested_items.name: failureReason
nested_items.description: The reason the create-resource-configuration request failed.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the resource configuration.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The most recent date and time that the resource configuration was updated, in ISO-8601 format.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the resource configuration.

nested_items.name: portRanges
nested_items.description: The TCP port ranges that a consumer can use to access a resource configuration. You can separate port ranges with a comma. Example: 1-65535 or 1,2,22-30
(string) ---

nested_items.name: protocol
nested_items.description: The TCP protocol accepted by the specified resource configuration.

nested_items.name: resourceConfigurationDefinition
nested_items.description: The resource configuration.

nested_items.name: arnResource
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.

nested_items.name: dnsResource
nested_items.description: The DNS name of the resource.

nested_items.name: domainName
nested_items.description: The domain name of the resource.

nested_items.name: ipAddressType
nested_items.description: The type of IP address.

nested_items.name: ipResource
nested_items.description: The IP resource.

nested_items.name: ipAddress
nested_items.description: The IP address of the IP resource.

nested_items.name: resourceConfigurationGroupId
nested_items.description: The ID of the group resource configuration.

nested_items.name: resourceGatewayId
nested_items.description: The ID of the resource gateway used to connect to the resource configuration in a given VPC. You can specify the resource gateway identifier only for resource configurations with type SINGLE, GROUP, or ARN.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the resource configuration.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of resource configuration.
SINGLE - A single resource.
GROUP - A group of resources.
CHILD - A single resource that is part of a group resource configuration.
ARN - An Amazon Web Services resource.
